# Description

I work as a PhD candidate at the Department of Child and Adolescent Psychiatry/Psychology and am involved in the Erasmus MC Center of Expertise for Neurodevelopmental Disorders (ENCORE) through the UNIEK study. In my work, I focus on the heterogeneity of autistic characteristics.

member_name <- "Kamil Hiralal"

  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", all_of(special_skill), "preregistration", "data sharing", "open source software", "open access", "data management"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)
